A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Deft blend of storytelling\, emotion\, and homage. Revelatory\, funny\, and fresh. I'm amazed at people who are upset at what they perceive to be disrespectful treatment of material; Luke tossing the lightsaber is brilliant\, and shows something other than what we've come to expect. As a fanatic since age 8\, I was moved by Hamill and Fisher's performances\, and by the great character depth portrayed by the new actors. Best by far since ESB.
